thread.title: Noelle G
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Noelle G

author: Noelle G
title: Noelle G
text: My sales associate, Rebecca Smith was awesome to work with. I purchased a new mattress set and she was patient and spent the time showing me a variety of mattresses based upon what my wants and needs were. The Presidents Day sale was fantastic as well. Upon delivery, the gentleman were very pleasant and polite. Highly recommended!!!
